description: Procedurally generated stone texture with gray tones and natural depth variations

generation_algorithm.step5: Apply base colors: r = 120 + stoneNoise * 30, g = 120 + stoneNoise * 30, b = 125 + stoneNoise * 30
generation_algorithm.step6: No pattern features applied - pure continuous noise
generation_algorithm.step7: Clamp all color values to [0, 255] range

metadata.purpose: JSON conversion of actual in-game stone block texture

technical_notes.complexity: Most complex noise algorithm so far - uses 3 overlapping noise functions
unique_features: Triple noise generation (sin + cos + combined sin)
Mixed coordinate systems (X+Y, X*Y, separate X and Y)
Different amplitudes for each noise layer (0.3, 0.3, 0.4)
technical_notes.implementation_challenge: Universal generator needs to support triple noise generation
technical_notes.stone_characteristics: Creates natural stone variation with depth and cracks
